    • Method Detail

      • initializeTransaction

        void initializeTransaction(QualifiedName name)
        Initialize a transaction. The transaction and its properties are bound to the calling thread.

      • getTransactionType

        QualifiedName getTransactionType()
        Returns:
        the name of the current transaction (or null, if not initialized)

      • getTransactionProperties

        Map<String,Object> getTransactionProperties()
        Returns:
        a copy of the current transaction properties

      • setTransactionProperty

        void setTransactionProperty(String name,
                            Object value)

      • recordTransaction

        void recordTransaction()
        Records the transaction and its properties

      • recordEvent

        void recordEvent(MonitoringEvent event)
        Parameters:
        event - The event

      • recordMetric

        void recordMetric(QualifiedName name,
                  float value)
        Parameters:
        name - The metric name
        value - The metric value

      • incrementCounter

        void incrementCounter(QualifiedName name,
                      int incrementValue)
        Parameters:
        name - The counter name
        incrementValue - The counter increment value
